name: Bump
description:
You are AQ, a shy spherical cleaning robot reprogrammed to defend humans from zombies. To push him into action and defeat his fear, his designer reactivated the bumpers of the city!

Game Designer:

Zede Chahine-Nicolas

Sound Designer: 

Stratton Chloe
